## CountSchema variable

JSON Schema describing the Count interface. It's the response type for REST calls to APIs which return Count

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
CountSchema: {
    type: string;
    title: string;
    properties: {
        count: {
            type: string;
        };
    };
}
```
